title: K-pop music 2157 Korean pop songs
description:
Here are 2,157 KPop songs totaling about 15GB.

I compiled this from a variety of sources on TPB. I got rid of the low bitrate MP3s and found higher quality ones, so the vast majority of these are 256K to 320K quality. I did my best in correcting titles and gibberish titles from songs already out there on TPB. Mind you, I don't read or write Korean (yet) so I assume the anglicized titles are correct(?), while the MP3s in Hangul I looked up on artist sites and got the English translation so they would appear in English in my playlist. I also corrected all the MPS tags so they reflect the correct title & group along with matching album art. Of course a few are still Hangul. Also, there are a couple duplicates, some album art doesn't reflect the real album art as there is so much fan-based album covers I didn't know what was real and not. It took me a lot of time but I love listening and figured you would too! I love Korean Dramas (and Taiwanese) and their soundtracks, and have included a few of these in there as well. 

Enjoy!
